title: Ukraine’s state-owned hydro company lands €75 million EBRD loan to restore plants damaged in war
description: The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development and PJSC Ukrhydroenergo signed a €75 million loan for hydropower modernization in Ukraine.
content: The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development and PJSC Ukrhydroenergo signed a €75 million loan for hydropower modernization in Ukraine.
